CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: charge
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The charged particle coating disrupts armor and tissue in equal measure.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: concentrated charge
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Focuses charged particles around the tip of the core for improved armor penetration at the cost of stopping power.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: ion charge
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to combat mechanoids, the round creates an electrical current on impact, disrupting electronic systems temporarily.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: laser
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A concentrated beam or bolt of radiation, imparting disruptive energy into the target.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: incendiary
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with incendiary agent that ignites after impact.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: jellied chemfuel
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Highly flammable liquid, burns over time and catches nearby objects on fire.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: jellied prometheum
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Advanced pyrophoric compound in gel-form. Self-ignites on contact with air, sticks to skin and seeps into openings, burning even mechanoids.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: bioferrite
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: An infusion of crystalline bioferrite attacks organic matter on a cellular level, disrupting regeneration and weakening tisue.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: thermobaric
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with high-explosive aerosol that causes a large explosion and ignites flammable materials.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: foam
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Special round designed for civilian fire-fighting purposes. Filled with fire-retardant foam to suppress fires in a large area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: antigrain warhead
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A tiny ultra-tech warhead usually used by spacecraft or glitterworld war machines. Powered by a grain of antimatter, it creates a huge explosion and starts fires around the target.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: radiation
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Contains ionising gamma radiation that significantly impairs consciousness, and is a carcinogen.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: forsaken arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to be fired from a forsaken bow.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Plasma
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Highly-energized ionized gas capable of devastating burn effects.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Railgun sabot
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: nanobots (MT)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The nanobots inside this projectile will create a micro-turret near the place of impact.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Standard
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A gyro-stabilized projectile equipped with a hardened tip for penetrating armor and laden with a small explosive charge.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Inferno
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A gyro-stabilized projectile equipped with the explosive filler replaced with sticky, highly flammable prometheum.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Metal Storm
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A gyro-stabilized equipped with a proximity fuse, designed to shower lighly armored targets with a devestating shower of fragmention when it detonates.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Kraken
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A gyro-stabilized projectile with hardened penetrator and explosive 'kicker' charge, designed to punch through heavy armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Melta
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A concentrated beam of scorching plasma, capable of reducing even the heaviest of armor to molten slag.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: blaster
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Energy bolts created with tibanna gas. Causes neat punctures and burns that tend to carbonize and char. Low chance of wound infection.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: stun
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Low-energy bolts created with tibanna gas. Temporarily stuns and incapacitates the target.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: concentrated tibanna
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Energy bolts created with tibanna gas. Causes neat punctures and burns that tend to carbonize and char. Low chance of wound infection. Spun to a higher pressure to create bolts with improved penetration, at the loss of wounding potential.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: ionized tibanna
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Energy bolts created with tibanna gas. Causes neat punctures and burns that tend to carbonize and char. Low chance of wound infection. Ionized during the firing process to cause extra damage to droids and mechanoids, at the cost of reduced lethality against organics.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: hi-energy plasma charge
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A compressed plasma charge produces a powerful armour-penetrating explosion, along with a concentrated secondary blast. Lacks fragmentation effects, unlike earlier warhead designs, limiting effective radius.
